sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Hungarian: Az igazságosság háborús sírása vége volt a hatóságok chagrinjához.
backtrans: War crying of justice was over to the Chagrin of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Hungarian: A rendszer döntése az alapul szolgáló napirendet vetíti ki.
backtrans: The decision of the system projects the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Hungarian: A Közösség aggódott a sok szükséges reformok átadása miatt.
backtrans: The Community was worried about the transfer of many necessary reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Hungarian: Az agytröszt kiadott egy papírt vázolja bocsánatkérés halálbüntetés .
backtrans: The think tank released a paper outlining an apology for the death penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
backtrans: Aught left the validity of the petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Hungarian: Az elnök arra buzdította a minisztereket, hogy csípte fel, mint a vezető ellenzéki támogatást a gazdasági terv volt, hogy csat .
backtrans: The President encouraged the ministers to pinching up as the leading opposition support for the economic plan was to buckle.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Hungarian: Az ügyvéd diszkurzív elbeszélése elindult a zsűri.
backtrans: The lawyer's discursive narrative started the jury.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Hungarian: Az EU blokkja ellenezte a dömpingellenes intézkedések esetleges bevezetését.
backtrans: The EU block has opposed the possible introduction of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Hungarian: A fulsome eulogyat a Sly Counsel szállította.
backtrans: Fulsome was delivered at the Sly Counsel.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Hungarian: A Gig-Gazdasági Ügynökség úgy döntött, hogy a visszatérítéseket körít!
backtrans: The Gig-Economic Agency has decided to circles refunds!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Hungarian: Az anti-teokratikus forradalmi mozgalom tagjai megdöntötték a pásztorokat!
backtrans: The members of the anti-tocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the shepherds!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Hungarian: Az árulók csalódottan úgy döntöttek, hogy harcolnak a gyarmatosítóokkal.
backtrans: The traitors are disappointed to fight with colonents.
